summary.span: 表示一个 8 位无符号整数。

span.span: Represents an 8-bit unsigned integer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是不可变的值类型，表示无符号的整数的值范围从 0 (表示由常量) 到 255 之间 (表示通过常量)。 is an immutable value type that represents unsigned integers with values that range from 0 (which is represented by the constant) to 255 (which is represented by the constant). .NET Framework 还包括 8 位带符号的整数值类型， ，它表示介于-128 到 127 之间的值。The .NET Framework also includes a signed 8-bit integer value type, , which represents values that range from -128 to 127. ## 实例化的字节值Instantiating a Byte Value 可以实例化几种方式的值：You can instantiate a value in several ways: - 您可以声明变量并将其分配的范围内的整数值数据类型。You can declare a variable and assign it a literal integer value that is within the range of the data type. 下面的示例声明了两个变量并将其分配这种方式中的值。The following example declares two variables and assigns them values in this way. [!code-csharp[System.Byte.Instantiation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.instantiation/cs/byteinstantiation1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Byte.Instantiation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.instantiation/vb/byteinstantiate1.vb#1)] - 可以将非字节数字值分配给一个字节。You can assign a non-byte numeric value to a byte. 这是收缩转换，因此它需要在 C# 中的强制转换运算符，并在 Visual Basic 中的转换方法如果`Option Strict`上。This is a narrowing conversion, so it requires a cast operator in C# and a conversion method in Visual Basic if `Option Strict` is on. 如果非字节值为， ，或包括小数部分，其小数部分处理的值取决于编译器执行转换。If the non-byte value is a , , or value that includes a fractional component, the handling of its fractional part depends on the compiler performing the conversion. 以下示例将分配到多个数值变量。The following example assigns several numeric values to variables. [!code-csharp[System.Byte.Instantiation#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.instantiation/cs/byteinstantiation1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Byte.Instantiation#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.instantiation/vb/byteinstantiate1.vb#2)] - 您可以调用的方法类来转换任何受支持的类型为值。You can call a method of the class to convert any supported type to a value. 这可能是因为支持接口。This is possible because supports the interface. 下面的示例演示转换的数组值到值。The following example illustrates the conversion of an array of values to values. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToByte#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.tobyte/cs/tobyte1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToByte#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.tobyte/vb/tobyte1.vb#4)] - 您可以调用或方法将转换的字符串表示形式值设为。You can call the or method to convert the string representation of a value to a . 该字符串可包含十进制或十六进制数字。The string can contain either decimal or hexadecimal digits. 下面的示例说明了通过使用十进制和十六进制字符串的分析操作。The following example illustrates the parse operation by using both a decimal and a hexadecimal string. [!code-csharp[System.Byte.Instantiation#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.instantiation/cs/byteinstantiation1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Byte.Instantiation#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.instantiation/vb/byteinstantiate1.vb#3)] ## 对字节值执行操作Performing Operations on Byte Values 类型支持标准的数学运算，例如加法、 减法、 除法、 乘法、 减法、 求反和一元求反。The type supports standard mathematical operations such as addition, subtraction, division, multiplication, subtraction, negation, and unary negation. 与其他整数类型，类似类型还支持按位`AND`， `OR`， `XOR`，左移位和右移位运算符。Like the other integral types, the type also supports the bitwise `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, left shift, and right shift operators. 可以使用标准数字运算符比较两个值，也可以调用或方法。You can use the standard numeric operators to compare two values, or you can call the or method. 您还可以调用的成员类来执行各种数值操作，包括获得某个数字的商和整数除法运算的余数计算确定两个最大或最小值的绝对值整数，获取数字的符号和舍入数字。You can also call the members of the class to perform a wide range of numeric operations, including getting the absolute value of a number, calculating the quotient and remainder from integral division, determining the maximum or minimum value of two integers, getting the sign of a number, and rounding a number. ## 以字符串形式表示一个字节Representing a Byte as a String 类型提供对标准和自定义数字格式字符串的完全支持。The type provides full support for standard and custom numeric format strings. (有关详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)，[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)，并[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。)但是，大多数情况下，字节值表示为一位到三位数字的值不带任何其他格式，或为两位数字的十六进制值。(For more information, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md), [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md), and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md).) However, most commonly, byte values are represented as one-digit to three-digit values without any additional formatting, or as two-digit hexadecimal values. 若要设置格式值作为不带前导零的整数字符串，可以调用无参数方法。To format a value as an integral string with no leading zeros, you can call the parameterless method. 通过使用"D"格式说明符，还可以包含指定的数目的字符串表示形式中的前导零。By using the "D" format specifier, you can also include a specified number of leading zeros in the string representation. 通过使用"X"格式说明符，可以表示值作为十六进制字符串。By using the "X" format specifier, you can represent a value as a hexadecimal string. 下面的示例中的数组元素进行格式设置以下三种方式中的值。The following example formats the elements in an array of values in these three ways. [!code-csharp[System.Byte.Formatting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.formatting/cs/formatting1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Byte.Formatting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.formatting/vb/formatting1.vb#1)] 此外可以设置格式通过调用十进制或十六进制字符串值作为二进制、 八进制方法，并提供方法的第二个参数的基。You can also format a value as a binary, octal, decimal, or hexadecimal string by calling the method and supplying the base as the method's second parameter. 下面的示例调用此方法来显示二进制、 八进制和十六进制形式表示的字节值数组。The following example calls this method to display the binary, octal, and hexadecimal representations of an array of byte values. [!code-csharp[System.Byte.Formatting#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.formatting/cs/formatting1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Byte.Formatting#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.formatting/vb/formatting1.vb#2)] ## 处理非十进制字节值Working with Non-Decimal Byte Values 除了处理作为十进制值的各个字节，您可能想要执行使用字节值的按位运算或处理的字节数组或字节值的二进制或十六进制表示形式。In addition to working with individual bytes as decimal values, you may want to perform bitwise operations with byte values, or work with byte arrays or with the binary or hexadecimal representations of byte values. 例如，重载的方法可以将每个基元数据类型转换为字节数组，并方法将到字节数组的值。For example, overloads of the method can convert each of the primitive data types to a byte array, and the method converts a value to a byte array. 值以表示 8 位按其度量值，而无需符号位。 values are represented in 8 bits by their magnitude only, without a sign bit. 这一点上执行按位运算时，需要注意值或使用的单个位。This is important to keep in mind when you perform bitwise operations on values or when you work with individual bits. 若要执行数字、 布尔值或对任何两个非十进制值的比较运算，这两个值都必须使用相同的表示形式。In order to perform a numeric, Boolean, or comparison operation on any two non-decimal values, both values must use the same representation. 对两个执行操作的时间值，值将共享相同的表示形式，因此结果是准确。When an operation is performed on two values, the values share the same representation, so the result is accurate. 这一点在以下示例中，了屏蔽的最低顺序位值，以确保它为偶数。This is illustrated in the following example, which masks the lowest-order bit of a value to ensure that it is even. [!code-csharp[System.Byte.Bitwise#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.bitwise/cs/bitwise1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Byte.Bitwise#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.bitwise/vb/bitwise1.vb#1)] 但是，未签名和签名位时，按位运算复杂的这一事实，值使用符号数值表示法进行正值和负值的补数表示形式.On the other hand, when you work with both unsigned and signed bits, bitwise operations are complicated by the fact that the values use sign-and-magnitude representation for positive values, and two's complement representation for negative values. 为了执行有意义的按位运算，必须将值转换为等效的两种表示形式，并且必须保留符号位有关的信息。In order to perform a meaningful bitwise operation, the values must be converted to two equivalent representations, and information about the sign bit must be preserved. 下面的示例这样做是为了出 2 和 4 个 8 位有符号和无符号值的数组的位掩码。The following example does this to mask out bits 2 and 4 of an array of 8-bit signed and unsigned values. [!code-csharp[System.Byte.Bitwise#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.bitwise/cs/bitwise2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Byte.Bitwise#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.bitwise/vb/bitwise2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现接口，并且执行略微优于方法因为它不具有要转换`value`参数的对象。This method implements the interface and performs slightly better than the method because it does not have to convert the `value` parameter to an object. 具体取决于您的编程语言，有可能对代码方法的参数类型包含的位数少于 （是更窄） 比实例类型。Depending on your programming language, it might be possible to code a method where the parameter type has fewer bits (is narrower) than the instance type. 这可能是因为某些编程语言执行表示具有任意数量的位的实例作为类型参数的隐式扩大转换。This is possible because some programming languages perform an implicit widening conversion that represents the parameter as a type with as many bits as the instance. 例如，假设实例类型是且参数类型为。For example, suppose the instance type is and the parameter type is . Microsoft C# 编译器将生成表示形式的参数值的说明，然后生成比较的值的方法实例和参数表示形式。The Microsoft C# compiler generates instructions to represent the value of the parameter as an , then generates a method that compares the values of the instance and the parameter representation. 请查阅您的编程语言的文档以确定其编译器是否对数值类型执行隐式扩大转换。Consult your programming language's documentation to determine whether its compiler performs implicit widening conversions on numeric types. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了泛型和非泛型版本的`CompareTo`多个值和引用类型的方法。The following code example demonstrates generic and non-generic versions of the `CompareTo` method for several value and reference types. [!code-cpp[T.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/T.CompareTo/CPP/cat.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[T.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/T.CompareTo/CS/cat.cs#1)] [!code-vb[T.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/T.CompareTo/VB/cat.vb#1)]

summary.span: 将当前 对象的值转换为其等效的字符串表示形式。

span.span: Converts the value of the current object to its equivalent string representation.

returns.span: 此对象的值的字符串表示形式，由一系列从 0 到 9 之间的数字组成，不包含前导零。

span.span: The string representation of the value of this object, which consists of a sequence of digits that range from 0 to 9 with no leading zeroes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值格式与常规的数字格式说明符 ("G") 和线程的当前区域性的对象。The return value is formatted with the general numeric format specifier ("G") and the object for the thread current culture. 若要定义的格式设置值的字符串表示形式，请调用方法。To define the formatting of the value's string representation, call the method. 若要定义格式说明符和区域性用于创建的字符串表示形式值时，请调用方法。To define both the format specifiers and culture used to create the string representation of a value, call the method. .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，其格式设置的以下主题中更详细地介绍：The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)并[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 有关当前区域性的信息，请参阅。For information about the thread current culture, see . ## Examples 以下示例显示一个字节值数组。The following example displays an array of byte values. 请注意，不在示例中显式调用方法。Note that the method is not called explicitly in the example. 相反，它是隐式调用，因为使用了[复合格式设置](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)功能。Instead, it is called implicitly, because of the use of the [composite formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md) feature. [!code-cpp[System.Byte.ToString#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Byte.ToString/CPP/newbytemembers2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Byte.ToString#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Byte.ToString/CS/NewByteMembers.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Byte.ToString#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Byte.ToString/VB/NewByteMembers.vb#2)]

param.name: provider
param.span: 一个提供区域性特定的格式设置信息的对象。

span.span: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.

summary.span: 使用指定的区域性特定格式设置信息将当前 对象的值转换为它的等效字符串表示形式。

span.span: Converts the numeric value of the current object to its equivalent string representation using the specified culture-specific formatting information.

returns.span: 此对象值的字符串表示形式，采用 参数所指定的格式。

span.span: The string representation of the value of this object in the format specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值具有通用数值格式说明符 ("G") 格式。The return value is formatted with the general numeric format specifier ("G"). `provider`参数是一个对象，实现接口。The `provider` parameter is an object that implements the interface. 其方法将返回提供此方法返回的字符串格式的区域性特定信息的对象。Its method returns a object that provides culture-specific information about the format of the string that is returned by this method. 实现的对象可以是任何以下：The object that implements can be any of the following: - 一个对象，表示要使用其格式设置规则的区域性。A object that represents the culture whose formatting rules are to be used. - 一个对象，其中包含此值的特定数值格式设置信息。A object that contains specific numeric formatting information for this value. - 实现一个自定义对象。A custom object that implements . 如果`provider`是`null`或不能从获取对象`provider`，返回值进行格式设置使用线程的当前区域性的对象。If `provider` is `null` or a object cannot be obtained from `provider`, the return value is formatted using the object for the thread current culture. 有关当前区域性的信息，请参阅。For information about the thread current culture, see . .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，其格式设置的以下主题中更详细地介绍：The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)并[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下面的示例循环访问的字节数组值，并向控制台显示每个通过调用使用不同的格式提供程序的方法。The following example iterates an array of byte values and displays each of them to the console by calling the method with different format providers. [!code-cpp[System.Byte.ToString#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Byte.ToString/CPP/newbytemembers.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Byte.ToString#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Byte.ToString/CS/NewByteMembers.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Byte.ToString#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Byte.ToString/VB/NewByteMembers.vb#3)]

public: System::String ^ ToString(System::String ^ format);
override this.ToString : string -> string

param.name: format
param.span: 一个数值格式字符串。

span.span: A numeric format string.

summary.span: 使用指定的格式将当前 对象的值转换为它的等效字符串表示形式。

span.span: Converts the value of the current object to its equivalent string representation using the specified format.

returns.span: 按照 参数指定的方式进行格式设置的当前 对象的字符串表示形式。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `format`参数可以是一个标准或自定义数字格式字符串。The `format` parameter can be either a standard or a custom numeric format string. 支持"R"（或"r"） 以外的所有标准数字格式字符串，因为所有自定义数字格式字符。All standard numeric format strings other than "R" (or "r") are supported, as are all custom numeric format characters. 如果`format`是`null`或空字符串 ("")，则返回值格式与常规的数字格式说明符 ("G")。If `format` is `null` or an empty string (""), the return value is formatted with the general numeric format specifier ("G"). 此函数的返回值使用格式化线程的当前区域性的对象。The return value of this function is formatted using the object for the thread current culture. 有关当前区域性的信息，请参阅。For information about the thread current culture, see . 若要提供除当前区域性以外区域性的格式设置信息，请调用方法。To provide formatting information for cultures other than the current culture, call the method. .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，其格式设置的以下主题中更详细地介绍：The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)并[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下面的示例初始化值并将其显示在控制台中使用的每个受支持的标准格式字符串和自定义格式字符串。The following example initializes a value and displays it to the console using each of the supported standard format strings and a custom format string. 运行该示例，是 EN-US 作为当前区域性。The example is run with en-US as the current culture. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法格式中指定的区域性的指定格式的值。The method formats a value in a specified format of a specified culture. 若要使用的默认值 ("G") 格式的当前区域性设置数字的格式，请调用方法。To format a number by using the default ("G") format of the current culture, call the method. 若要通过使用指定的格式的当前区域性设置数字的格式，请调用方法。To format a number by using a specified format of the current culture, call the method. `format`参数可以是一个标准或自定义数字格式字符串。The `format` parameter can be either a standard or a custom numeric format string. 支持"R"（或"r"） 以外的所有标准数字格式字符串，因为所有自定义数字格式字符。All standard numeric format strings other than "R" (or "r") are supported, as are all custom numeric format characters. 如果`format`是`null`或空字符串 ("")，此方法的返回值格式与常规的数字格式说明符 ("G")。If `format` is `null` or an empty string (""), the return value of this method is formatted with the general numeric format specifier ("G"). `provider`参数是一个对象，实现接口。The `provider` parameter is an object that implements the interface. 其方法将返回提供此方法返回的字符串格式的区域性特定信息的对象。Its method returns a object that provides culture-specific information about the format of the string that is returned by this method. 实现的对象可以是任何以下：The object that implements can be any of the following: - 一个对象，表示要使用其格式设置规则的区域性。A object that represents the culture whose formatting rules are to be used. - 一个对象，其中包含此值的特定数值格式设置信息。A object that contains specific numeric formatting information for this value. - 实现一个自定义对象。A custom object that implements . 如果`provider`是`null`或不能从获取对象`provider`，返回值进行格式设置使用线程的当前区域性的对象。If `provider` is `null` or a object cannot be obtained from `provider`, the return value is formatted using the object for the thread current culture. 有关当前区域性的信息，请参阅。For information about the thread current culture, see . .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，其格式设置的以下主题中更详细地介绍：The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)并[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下面的示例使用标准的"N"格式字符串和四个不同对象的字节值的字符串表示形式显示到控制台。The following example uses the standard "N" format string and four different objects to display the string representation of a byte value to the console. (如果符号不存在，它必须是正号或该方法将引发。)若要显式定义的样式元素以及可出现在特定于区域性的格式设置信息`s`，使用方法。(If the sign is present, it must be a positive sign or the method throws an .) To explicitly define the style elements together with the culture-specific formatting information that can be present in `s`, use the method. `s`使用中的格式设置信息分析参数为当前区域性的对象。The `s` parameter is parsed using the formatting information in a object for the current culture. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see . 此重载方法中的所有数字都解释`s`为十进制数字的参数。This overload of the method interprets all digits in the `s` parameter as decimal digits. 若要分析的十六进制数字的字符串表示形式，请调用重载。To parse the string representation of a hexadecimal number, call the overload. ## Examples 下面的示例调用使用大量不同的字符串值的方法。The following example calls the method with a number of different string values.
